name: 2.5D Dungeon Crawler (temporary name)
description:
As the name says, it's a simple Dungeon Crawler prototype with a 2.5D perspective. It was made using the Godot Engine and a couple of free assets.

You control the character by using WASD to move, while you aim the weapon's direction with the mouse. Your sword has two different attacks with LMB and RMB.

The level is simple: You're in a dungeon where you have to find a key that opens the passage to the Boss, which currently is the only enemy. After defeating it, the exit door opens and the game ends when you enter it.
